solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String longestCommonPrefix(String[] strs) {--newline--        if(strs == null || strs.length == 0)    return "";--newline--        String pre = strs[0];--newline--        int i = 1;--newline--        while(i < strs.length){--newline--            while(strs[i].indexOf(pre) != 0)--newline--                pre = pre.substring(0,pre.length()-1);--newline--            i++;--newline--        }--newline--        return pre;--newline--    }--newline--}
